- [ ] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [ ] Scaffold the Project: Project scaffold generated for frontend, backend, and OCR services.
- [ ] Install Required Extensions: No automatic extension installs; developer may install recommended extensions.
- [ ] Compile the Project: Use pnpm install and Docker Compose to build and run services.
- [ ] Create and Run Task: Consider adding tasks.json for VS Code to run dev stack.
- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete: README.md present with quick start instructions.
